Key Match Events: Bangladesh knocked out of ICC Men’s T20 World Cup
Pakistan joined India in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-finals from Super-12 Group-2 after defeating Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan said his team could have done better after being eliminated from the ongoing ICC Men’s T20 World Cup
Shakib mentioned that this was the team’s best performance in the T20 World Cup but they could’ve done better
Shakib stated that 145-150 would have been a reasonable total on the Adelaide pitch
Shakib expressed his desire to continue playing as long as he is fit and performing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh finished second from bottom in Group-2, with 4 points from 5 matches
